name: Selfless Cathar
originalText: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Selfless Cathar: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: You can activate Selfless Cathar’s ability even if you control no other creatures.
Only creatures you control when Selfless Cathar’s ability resolves will be affected. Creatures that enter the battlefield or that you gain control of later in the turn will not.

text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Selfless Cathar: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
